page.description: Return a blob containing the contents of a windows .BMP formatted QRCode image.
page.syntax: PUBLIC STATIC GenerateBmpFile AS L (text AS C, filename AS C, correctionLevel AS C)

argument.name: correctionLevel AS C
argument.description: Correction level can be L,M,Q or H (L=7%, M=15%, Q=25%, H=30%). See [QRCode Namespace] for more information.
